'''ENDOOM''' is the colorful screen shown when Doom exits. By default, ENDOOM screens are not displayed, but the option to enable them is found in the [[display options]] [[Menus|menu]]. {{Doomwiki}}
The ENDOOM lump is named ENDTEXT in Heretic and ENDSTRF in Strife. Hexen does not feature one.
The format must be an [[ANSI]] graphical text screen.
[[category:Graphics lumps]]
